thread.title: DAVE ROMINGER
thread.title_full: World Wide Stereo reviewed by DAVE ROMINGER

author: DAVE ROMINGER
title: DAVE ROMINGER
text: I had excellent technical and costumer service from both Austin Marvel and Tommy Gillanders. management should know that they were both excellent, good listeners and great advisors as we had issue with a bad power supply in our subwoofer. It was super easy and quick to get a replacement unit with good decision making that was clear and easy to act on. Not surprised at all by the staff.
